pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, October 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

The Prime Minister will participate in a G7 Leaders’ meeting on Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

Sorel-Tracy, Quebec

Private meetings

2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Rio Tinto Fer et Titane facility.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Montréal, Quebec

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with a local seniors’ organization at a community centre.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
